translations.translation: So your Lord poured a scourge of punishment over them.
Then their Lord unloosed upon them the lash of chastisement.
Thus, your Lord afflicted them with torment;
Therefore your Lord struck them hard with the means of punishment.
So, your Lord poured on them different kinds of severe torment.
Therefore your Lord let down upon them a portion of the chastisement.
Thy Lord unloosed on them a scourge of chastisement;
Therefore thy Lord poured on them the disaster of His punishment.
so your Lord unleashed on them the scourge of punishment:
Wherefore thy Lord poured on them the scourge of His torment.
so your Lord poured on them lashes of punishment.
Therefore did thy Lord pour on them a scourge of diverse chastisements:
So your Lord poured on them different kinds of severe torment.
(Therefore) your Lord let loose upon them a scourge of punishment;
So your Lord poured down upon them a scourge of punishment.
So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
[89:13] So your Lord poured on them a scourge of chastisement.
(Therefore thy Lord poured on them the disaster of His punishment) your Lord sent on them a severe punishment.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما بالغوا في الفساد والإفساد { فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ } [الفجر: 13] أي: نوعاً من العذاب، كأنه يصب عليهم ويمطر كالمَّاء من السحاب، وهو كناية عن ترادف موجات الهلاك وتتابعها، وبالجملة: أهلكهم بأشد العذاب وأكثره
